comments.content:
it's relly similar to mini 7, just have a few diferences.   
the symbol "&" have a pixel of diference, the character "E" have une pixel more of width.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141133im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/19201.gif)

Another close match is Craig Kroeger's { [Miniml](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141133/http:/www.miniml.com/)} Uni 05 pixel font. The leg on the cap 'R" is different and the ampersand is a pixel wider, although it is the same shape.   
   
 ![Pixel Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141133im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/19209.gif)
Alright, alright... I get the point. Silly man.

[What are the chances of me getting the last word in on this thread?]   
   
No they're not, Yves. What's a cannon if not loose?
